title: The Circus Collection
description: This is a fantastic bumper volume of classic stories from a much-loved author. The "Circus" stories are one of Blyton's best loved works, featuring the adventures of Mr. Galliano's famous travelling circus. Meet the elephants, monkeys and clowns and step into the ring of the most famous circus of them all! Enid Blyton was the queen of adventures stories full of imaginative adventures and unusual characters. Packed full of wonder, these tales will delight children everywhere. These are magical tales of excitement and adventure from Enid Blyton. This volume contains "Mr Galliano's Circus", "Circus Days Again" and "Come to the Circus".
author: Enid Blyton
